attributes.comment:
Raising the fee to apply for citizenship is unnecessary and may cause hardship
to those applying. There seems to be no need: the US government does not need
the extra money. However increasing the fee by more than 50% makes it a lot more
difficult for those applying. The US seems to be doing themselves a disservice
in this, as this country can greatly benefit from the depth of diversity and
wealth of life experience these people would be bringing as US citizens. Making
it harder for them to become citizens will be hurting everyone involved.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Sophia J. Hochstedler
